{"id":960375796,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1685464799,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/960375796/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        set<vector<int>> res;\n        \n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size()-2; ++i) {    \n            int low = i+1;\n            int hi = nums.size()-1;\n            while(low < hi) {\n                vector<int> v;\n                if (nums[i]+nums[low]+nums[hi] == 0) {\n                    v.push_back(nums[i]);\n                    v.push_back(nums[low]);\n                    v.push_back(nums[hi]);\n                    res.insert(v);\n                    hi--;low++;\n                } else if (nums[i]+nums[low]+nums[hi] > 0)\n                hi--;\n                else low++;\n            }\n        }\n        vector<vector<int>> result(res.begin(), res.end());\n        return result;    \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false}
